mapper.select: select id, order_id, cmt_rate, cmt_desc_cn, cmt_desc_en from lanmao.comment natural join lanmao."order" natural join lanmao.goods where seller_id=#{user} order by post_time desc limit 10 offset (#{page}-1)*10
select pict_url from lanmao.comment_picture where cmt_id=#{comment}
mapper.delete: delete from lanmao.comment_picture where cmt_id=#{comment} and pict_url=#{picture}
